info.title: Dance Byte API
info.description: These apis are used to provide functionality to Dance Byte app

post.description: Verifies whether the passed username is available or not

200.description: Returns string Available or Not Available

post.description: Gets the profile of provided userId

200.description: Returns string Requested user got successfully or You have provided wrong userId

post.description: Gets the followers/followings list of provided userId

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: In this field you have to provide either followers or followings so that we provide concerning list

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit to get followers/followings list with pagination. If you don't provide this by default this will get value from config.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: offset to get followers/followings list with pagination. If you don't provide this by default this will get value from config.

200.description: Returns string Followers/Followings List fetched successfully with followers/followings list array or Sorry you don't have followers/followings.
